Description:
CLASSIC EDWARDIAN OPPOSITE THE DARLING GARDENS
The beautiful Darling Gardens at your doorstep, this charming Edwardian boasts superb period appeal, comfortable living areas and great inner-north lifestyle options. High ceilings, ornate cornices and exquisite stucco plasterwork showcase the traditions of yesteryear, from a spacious lounge with cosy fireplace to the bright open-plan kitchen/meals area, amplified by a lofty vaulted ceiling, timber benchtops and stainless-steel appliances, as double doors unfold to a sublime deck and leafy courtyard sanctuary. Three generous bedrooms (two BIRs) are complemented by a spotless bathroom with stone double vanity and laundry facilities, timber boards, ducted heating, split-system cooling and underfloor storage. Ideally placed to enjoy Queens Parade and Smith St cafes, restaurants and nightspots, plus close to schools and public transport.
Insights: 23 South Terrace, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
ELEGANT CONVERSION STYLE
This former shopfront, now a light-filled contemporary residence, offers low-maintenance living in a prized precinct close to Village cafes, schools, station and Yarra parkland. A free-flowing floor plan includes living and dining areas separated by a streamlined kitchen with quality appliances, custom cabinetry and pantry, three double bedrooms (BIRs, main with ensuite), stylish fully-tiled bathroom and concealed laundry. With generous outdoor living space, prized off-street parking and garden storage shed, this immaculately presented residence features an open fireplace, polished hardwood floors, ducted heating and cooling, speaker wiring and premium fittings. Conveniently located on the high of the hill with easy access to city train, shops, parks and restaurants.
Insights: 49 Ramsden Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
WOODLAWN TERRACE C.1888
Classic Victorian elevated terrace retaining many of the unique decorative features of the boom time era, including tuck pointed Hawthorn brickwork, blue stone foundations, iron fences, iron lace work, arched hallway & towering high ceilings throughout the home. The terrace in excellent condition with fantastic potential for future renovations & extensions (STCA). Currently comprising two bedrooms, generous open plan living / dining rooms with a modern kitchen, leading to a laundry & new bathroom. The rear of the home provides parking for one or two cars with scope to create a landscaped garden area. Conveniently located in one of Clifton Hills most sort after addresses and only moments from city train, supermarket, restaurants and cafes this prized terrace home is sure to impress.
Insights: 66 Berry Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious Family Haven With A Tranquil Garden Focus
Overlooking a wonderful, established, productive rear garden designed for private enjoyment and entertaining, this large renovated 2-level family home (on 560m2 approx.) is an idyllic indoor-outdoor retreat in a sought-after parklands and schools position. Updated with hydronic heating, evaporative cooling and security alarm, a flexible floorplan of 4 bedrooms and large office/study or 5th bedroom flows to a light-filled family living and dining zone opening to sweeping alfresco deck and BBQ area. This immaculate home near Merri Creek, inner-city cafes, shopping and train station offers upstairs children's wing with lounge and 2nd bathroom, excellent Bosch-equipped kitchen, laundry, attic/roof storage, polished floorboards, OFPs, 10,000l underground raintank, garden shed, multiple fruit trees and ample off-street parking.
Insights: 6 Clifton Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 1 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
RENOVATED WITH DISTINCTION ON DOUBLE BLOCK
Victorian elegance and light-filled modern style are superbly fused in this fine balcony terrace on a wide garden block close to schools, Village shops, station and Yarra parkland. A classic floor plan incorporates formal sitting and dining rooms, (potential 4th bedroom), high-ceilinged informal living and dining areas flowing through French doors to a tranquil stone-paved landscaped garden (ROW access), bespoke kitchen with premium appliances, stone benchtops and pull-out pantry, handsome balcony bedroom and 2 further double bedrooms (one opening to sunny northerly balcony), stylishly refitted bathroom, powder room and full laundry. Including 2 parking spaces, this delightful residence features ample storage, hydronic heating, split-system air conditioning, open fireplaces and Boom-period detail.
Insights: 30 Gordon Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Historic Mountjoy...Once in a lifetime opportunity
With an extensive frontage of some 24 metres Mountjoy sits proudly on approximately 820 square metres of elevated ground with superb rear access.
Many have strolled past the chromatic tuck pointed brickwork facade including bay window with lion sentries standing guard over the entry and wondered just what lay behind the facade.
An inspection will impress and delight and give a glimpse of the wealth that the original owner must have possessed to build such a lavish home. The basics are still here and we trust a visionary will purchase the home and restore and develop it to the grandeur it deserves.
A wide hallway with intricate arched columns and some of the most elaborate etched stained glass windows frame the hall which leads to 5 rooms, the ones to the right linked between equally impressive archway openings and two on the left as original bedrooms. A wonderful depiction of the Mountjoy and Dartmouth stand emblazoned over the front door in red etched glass hinting at the provenance of the owner.
To the rear of the hall a modern style bathroom and kitchen were added within the structure in the 1960-70s but appropriately hide the narrow stair that leads to the original tower box room with maid style proportion including a small candle gas heater with gas wall lamp. ( neither operable). Other storage vestibules, amenity rooms and sheds make up the property though its fair to say the new owner is going to have some ‘ hard yards’ and sound thinking in front of them to make this the once grand home it was and deserves to be again.
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Striking Warehouse Sanctuary in Parklands Environs
The spectacular profile of this light-filled residence reveals a striking warehouse conversion of form and functionality cleverly conceived for exceptional low-maintenance living. Industrial elements merge with modern design throughout an easily-managed layout including two large bedrooms (upstairs with built-in robes and adjoining study with sweeping views from Studley Park to the city), spacious, sunlit open-plan living and dining area overlooking north garden, brilliant stainless-steel kitchen with Blanco/Miele appliances, central bathroom, laundry, heating/cooling, natural ventilation and ample storage. A quiet village location, 5 minutes' walk to tranquil parkland and river trails, completes an idyllic lifestyle setting complemented by this superb two-level home's northerly rear orientation with sunny established courtyard garden and ROW access to Brockenshire Street. Just a short stroll to cafes, schools and train station.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128
Insights: 14 Dally Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
A GRAND DESIGN FOR FAMILY LIFE
With an extra-wide frontage of 7.6 m approx, this gorgeous single-fronted Hawthorn brick terrace showcases surprising proportions and a spectacular 2 level extension designed for family-oriented living. Dark polished floorboards and white interiors showcase period features and bright & airy spaces. Generous open-plan living unfolds with surprising ease maintaining the same lofty ceiling height and introducing contemporary style. The versatile layout incorporates a ground-floor main bedroom (WIR & ensuite) and front sitting room/4th bedroom, separate powder room, gourmet kitchen incorporating black stone bench tops & stainless steel appliances plus spacious full width living & dining zones with a wall of bi-fold doors opening to a deck and generous north facing established rear garden with garage/workshop (ROW). Upstairs offers two further bedrooms (BIRs), a family bathroom plus a casual living/retreat area with a covered north-facing terrace to enjoy. Other features include a heated slab of polished concrete, light well garden, a butler's pantry with laundry facilities, hydronic heating and a wonderful lifestyle location close to the station, parks, shop/cafes & schools. This quality home will prove irresistible. Land: 290.3 m2 approx. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 48 Ramsden Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Potential Near Parkland With Dual Rear Access
An exciting double-fronted discovery just a hop, skip and jump to Spensley Street Primary School and Merri Creek parkland and trails. A large 311 sq. metre allotment (approx.) with side access and rear ROW provides an inspirational setting for the outstanding transformation of this comfortable solid brick Victorian. Elevated on a coveted street near local cafes, Queens Parade shopping and train station, this long-held home with a functional 2 bedroom floorplan is eminently livable offering exceptional scope to renovate and redefine its desirable inner-city dimensions (STCA). A rare lifestyle opportunity in a sought-after location, currently comprising high ceilings, living room with gas heater, dining room, kitchen with classic breakfast nook, central bathroom and a large secluded backyard.
Insights: 59 Dwyer Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2019 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Impressive space and perfect parkland views
Overlooking the wide open spaces of Ramsden Street Reserve, this distinctive three-level residence offers an exceptional lifestyle/investment opportunity with its abundant space, quality features and sublime city-edge location. Pristine interior boasts 2 large upstairs bedrooms (with robes) and two-way bathroom, plus huge top-floor master/retreat with dual robes, ensuite and fabulous views. Downstairs: open-design living and dining areas complemented by a granite-bench kitchen complete with dishwasher. Other highlights include ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, laundry/powder room (third WC), under-stair storeroom, as well as a private rear courtyard with secure off-street parking via ROW. Instant access to acres of parkland and endless kilometres of Merri Creek/Yarra River bike trails, it's also close to public transport and some of inner-Melbourne's best cafe/shopping precincts.
Agent - hockingstuart
Charles Atkins : 0405 287 112

Description:
1920'S APPEAL, POSITION AND POTENTIAL
This charming bay-windowed period home, elevated from the street, offers comfortable living now, with wonderful potential for renovation and extension (STCA) in a sought-after position close to Dight's Falls, Village cafes, transport and schools. It comprises two double bedrooms (BIR's) , a spacious living room with tapestry-brick surround gas heating, large kitchen/meals with '50s cabinetry, neat bathroom, laundry and WC. Opening to the rear is a north-facing garden and double ROW-access garage. Here is a rare opportunity to create a stylish family home to complement the neighbouring properties in a peaceful city-edge precinct.

Description:
Classic Features for a Promising Future
This most attractive single fronted solid brick residence located in this delightful position, maintains many classic features of the era including high ceilings, open fire places and polished floorboards whilst offering the ability to refurbish an already alluring interior.
Ample accommodation is provided through three bedrooms (third bedroom with mezzanine) and separate lounge room with attic. Kitchen and adjoining dining area with bathroom and laundry to the rear of the property and right of way at the back of the block for additional access and further potential.
Just moments from Yarra parklands, Darling Gardens, shops, transport and easy access to Eastern Freeway, an opportunity awaits to obtain a classic property in an outstanding setting which offers a number of options.
Chris Cain : 0419 140 765

Description:
Smart single level Victorian with 2 Street frontages
In a prized position loaded with lifestyle rewards, this smartly renovated brick Victorian's easy single level proportions are perfectly placed to maximise both the best of the inner city and the tranquility of Merri Creek! At the end of a period row in an equally distinguished streetscape, original dimensions with their traditional high ceilings and arched hallway host two genuine double bedrooms with the clear advantage of floor to ceiling built in robes/ storage. Beyond, two separate living domains and an open central kitchen with stainless steel appliances relish a sunny northern aspect shared with an alfresco entertaining deck, landscaped courtyard garden and carport with built in storage via Rose Street. With full bathroom, Euro laundry, ducted heating, polished timber floors and options to further update if ever desired (STCA). Walk to Village shops and eateries, trains, buses, easy Eastern Freeway access.
Insights: 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

With unrivalled views over one of the area's finest parks, this light-filled apartment is an enticing home or prime investment, close to tram and train transport and Queen's Parade's renowned cafe strip. With the rare appeal of three double bedrooms, here is an inviting property in a well-maintained block, offering a north-facing living and dining room open to a stylish upgraded kitchen (stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances), large bathroom/laundry (bath and shower) and separate WC. Included are covered parking, split-system air conditioning and ample storage.

Description:
Extra Wide 3 bed 2 bath Family Home moments to Gold Street Primary School
An extra wide double-storey discovery with established family credentials, this elegant 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom early Victorian is beautifully presented in quiet classical surroundings affording quality modern living and secluded alfresco entertaining. Conveniently located a close walk to school, Darling Gardens, Queens Parade shops, trams and the train station. The fine family proportions of this gracious home are perfectly enhanced by captivating period character, excellent features and upper-level vistas, including the city. A flexible interior includes grand sitting room, separate dining room, family/meals area opening on to a pretty courtyard garden, kitchen with Smeg appliances, main bedroom with WIR and ensuite, arched hallways, under stair storage, laundry, gas heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, polished floorboards, OFPs, heritage ceilings with antique lighting plus rear ROW.
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious, Modern & Private In Parklands Pocket
Superbly designed for effortless family living with an indoor-outdoor entertaining edge, this spacious modern residence with rear Clifford Place access enjoys a wonderful village position at the gateway to hectares of sporting fields, Yarra parkland and river trails. Keep maintenance to a minimum and get on with inner-city life as this stylish quality 2-level home is brimming with space featuring a 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom layout complemented by large lounge and family living zones. Highlighted by central atrium terrace, balcony views of the city skyline and attractive courtyard garden with alfresco area; other attributes include gourmet kitchen with Smeg appliances, laundry, heating/cooling, marble and granite surfaces, polished hardwood floors, new carpets and secure OSP. Close to schools, cafes, shops and train station.
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
RIPE FOR RENOVATION
A rare gem! Nestled in the quiet street of one of Melbourne's most exclusive suburbs is this single-storey Federation style property, ripe for refurbishment. Offering huge scope to be truly special, this renovator's delight is freestanding on one side. Set on a level block, the layout includes formal entry foyer, adjoining living (OFP) and kitchen areas, separate dining room (OFP), 3 bedrooms (1 x fireplace), 2 bathrooms, high ceilings, a sunny private rear yard with veranda, shed external store room and toilet facilities. Now offered for the first time in many years, this fashionably located home is bathed in N/E sunlight and just a stroll to some of Melbourne's premier gardens, cafes, boutiques, transport & Clifton Hill village shops.
Ideal for couples/families seeking the best in lifestyle options and enjoy the prospect of reinvigorating this property, creating your dream home.
Positioned in a highly coveted and tightly Melbourne suburb, this one will go quick!
Enquire today!
Anthony Cimino : 0400 500 903

Description:
Substantial Living With Park Views & Prized Versatility
Wonderful uninterrupted views of the parkland opposite unfold like the abundant space and superb features that highlight the flexible family-focused nature of this substantial executive town residence. A secluded and stylish inner-city sanctuary with no body corporate, the quality of this excellent four bedroom, three bathroom home is immediately evident with beautiful timber floors, marble and granite finishes, high ceilings and ever-present outlook over the park. Walk to schools, shops, cafes, train station and Yarra River trails from this refined residence offering north-facing living room, dining room flowing to entertainers' courtyard, gourmet Blanco-equipped kitchen, powder room, laundry, two ensuites and study nook, built-in-robes, storage, balcony plus remote-control two-car carport.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978

Description:
Inner-city sanctuary of space and serenity
A spectacular warehouse conversion of unexpected space and style, this stunning tri-level home offers a peaceful lifestyle sanctuary in a vibrant inner-urban location. With its own street frontage, secure and secluded beyond heritage façade, this cleverly-zoned home is extremely spacious and inviting at the same time with plenty of exposed brick walls and soaring vaulted ceilings underpinning contemporary designer touches. 3 large bedrooms (2/WIRs, 1/study nook, main/sleek ensuite) are served by superb family bathroom and laundry whilst upper level is dedicated to everyday living and entertaining with stone/Smeg kitchen (integrated fridge/freezer) and light-filled open-plan areas unfolding to sky-high north balcony. Industrial chic on the fringe of Clifton Hill Village near Yarra parklands, cafes and transport also featuring hydronic heating, air-conditioner, lower level double glazing, intercom entry and auto-under-cover parking for 2 cars with internal access.
Insights: 1/2 Groom Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2015 and 3 other 3 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.
